short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This browser extension helps you remove distraction from the web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hold down Options (Alt) + Shift ( ⌥ + ⇧) to remove any element on any web page. Great for increasing focus or removing annoying gifs in blog posts.

For LinkedIn users, you can turn off the feed.

Built with hiku.dev
